actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition.

official_title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to permit individuals who are elderly or disabled and who live in certain types of group-living arrangements to be treated as individual households.

summary.text: Amends the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to treat elderly or disabled individuals living in certain types of group-living arrangements as individual households.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to permit individuals who are elderly or disabled and who live in certain types of group-living arrangements to be treated as individual households.
